content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Max, I'm happy to have you here. The rental price for this brand-new, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center is 800 Euros.

If you agree to this price, please let me know. Keep in mind that this price is non-negotiable, considering the apartment's prime location and top-notch features.

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 800 Euros is too much for me. I can only offer 600 Euros. TERMINATE.
User 0: I understand your position, Max, but I'm sorry to say that the rental price of 800 Euros is non-negotiable. The apartment's prime location, modern features, and recent construction justify the price.

If you're unable to meet the rental price, I understand and we can terminate the negotiation here. Thank you for considering this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany
